mapper.update:
update guarantee
rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rcontent = #{rcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rpublicdate = #{rpublicdate,jdbcType=DATE},
raccpetdate = #{raccpetdate,jdbcType=DATE},
rcompletiondate = #{rcompletiondate,jdbcType=DATE},
rstate = #{rstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
revaluation = #{revaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aid = #{aid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
raddress = #{raddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rimg = #{rimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update guarantee set rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rcontent = #{rcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rpublicdate = #{rpublicdate,jdbcType=DATE}, raccpetdate = #{raccpetdate,jdbcType=DATE}, rcompletiondate = #{rcompletiondate,jdbcType=DATE}, rstate = #{rstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, revaluation = #{revaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aid = #{aid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, raddress = #{raddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rimg = #{rimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select rid, rname, rcontent, rpublicdate, raccpetdate, rcompletiondate, rstate, revaluation, uid, aid, raddress, rimg from guarantee
select rid, rname, rcontent, rpublicdate, raccpetdate, rcompletiondate, rstate, revaluation, uid, aid, raddress, rimg from guarantee limit #{start},#{limit}
